sys_ux_client_script.name: Task Approve/Reject

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_0ee0958819e03110a76996e82d94d7d4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">8ae0958812e031105b207a6e24b35ae2</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_6') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskApproveSysId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_8') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskRejectedSysId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    }
    helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
        api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    }, 500);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-04 10:41:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>0ee0958819e03110a76996e82d94d7d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Appian Draft" source="x_1047617_appian_0">6e5041874710311007046285d36d4363</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Appian Draft">6e5041874710311007046285d36d4363</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0ee0958819e03110a76996e82d94d7d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-04 10:41:27</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
